entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 10:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -34.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -38.2°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
